products.name: (C) Peleman Box A4 - 45mm
products.description:
This premium box with a magnetic closure can be used in a variety of special ways as a cherished keepsake:

  • perfect for onboarding a new member of the team
  • a childbirth box
  • a surprise box
  • a product launch
  • a gift box

products.name: (C) Peleman Box A4 - 90mm
products.description:
The Peleman Box is a brand new solution created to leave a lasting and unforgettable impression. The box is easy to assemble, fully customisable, and flat-packed for easy storage. The box has a magnetic closure and can be used in a variety of special way as a cherished keepsake.

  • perfect for onboarding a new member of the team
  • a childbirth box
  • a surprise box
  • a product launch
  • a gift box

products.name: Thermal Hard Cover A5 Portrait
products.description:
Thermal Hard Covers are ultra robust, premium quality covers. These binding covers are the ideal solution for creating customised and permanently bonded, durable presentation material. With the Thermal Binding systems you can crimp the spine for an optimal fit. The Thermal Hard Cover is available in A5, A4 and A3, in a range of colours.


This product was formerly known as SteelBook, UniCover Hard.

Peleman Photobook A4 Landscape Full Color
products.description: Capture Your Best Memories in Full Color

This HardCover, with a hardback Kashmir touch cover, is a pleasure to write in. Personalise your HardCover with your own company logo and the name of your employee.

products.name: Crystal Flex Covers
products.description:
The Crystal Flex Cover is the ideal binding solution for any document or presentation. Choose between a transparent or matte finish for the front or back cover.


This product was formerly known as SteelCrystal, UniCover Flex.

products.name: Spine Covers
products.description:
The Spine Cover is ideal if you want to bind using your own sheets, and don't want a plastic front or back cover. Leaving you to choose the right cover to meet your needs. You can also use it to bind A5 and A3 documents. Available in 3 spine sizes, up to 80 sheets. With the Spine Cover A4 you can bind A3 landscape and A4 portrait formats. With the Spine Cover A5 you can bind A4 landscape and A5 portrait formats.


This product was formerly known as SteelBack, Unicover Spine.

products.name: Mat Flex Covers
products.description:
The Matte Flex Cover is the ideal binding solution for any document or presentation. The matte finish is semi-transparent, yet still see-through.


This product was formerly known as SteelMat, UniCover Mat.

products.name: Thermal Soft Covers
products.description:
The Soft Cover is made of a flexible, yet durable, material.It is the perfect presentation solution for documents and notebooks.


This product was formerly known as UniCover Soft.

products.name: Dela Memorial PhotoBook A4
products.description:
Create this premium photo book all by yourself thanks to the handy Peleman Photo Editor filled with numerous ready-to-use designs. Just upload photos, order and you're done. A tangible memory with great emotional value for loved ones. TIP: order several photo books, e.g. one for each loved one.

Max 90 photos

products.name: Pro PhotoBook A4L
products.description: Thermal Hard Covers are ultra robust, premium quality covers.

products.name: Pro PhotoBook A4P
products.description: Thermal Hard Covers are ultra robust, premium quality covers.

products.name: Certificate Holder A4
products.description:
Present special documents or certificates in this Certificate Holder.Opt for a genuine leather cover for a truly deluxe finish. This holder can be easily customised with your own logo, occasion/event name or text/image of your choice.


This product was formerly known as Certificate Cover.

products.name: Hermans Memory Box with A4 PhotoBook
products.description:
Memories of a departed loved one are there to be cherished, to be cared for. A need that is conveniently addressed by this memory box. Relatives provide you with their favourite photos. You then create a premium photo book using the handy Peleman Photo Editor with numerous ready-made designs. Order and you're done. The family can then store the photo book neatly in an accompanying custom storage box.

A tangible keepsake with lots of emotional value. TIP: order several memorial boxes, e.g. one for each loved one.

products.name: Van Damme Memory Box with A4 PhotoBook
products.description:
Memories of a departed loved one are there to be cherished, to be cared for. A need that is conveniently addressed by this memory box. Relatives provide you with their favourite photos. You then create a premium photo book using the handy Peleman Photo Editor with numerous ready-made designs. Order and you're done. The family can then store the photo book neatly in an accompanying custom storage box.

A tangible keepsake with lots of emotional value. TIP: order several memorial boxes, e.g. one for each loved one.

products.name: VideoBook A4, Peel & Stick
products.description:
Bring your story to life with a VideoBook!

The VideoBook combines the best of both worlds: print with moving image and sound.The best of both worlds brought together in one medium. Without a doubt, your VideoBook will make a lasting impression on your clients.

Why choose a VideoBook?

Using our practical kit, add your video to your presentation material. No outsourcing required.

  • The screen can be glued on either the right or left side, using the Peel & Stick system.
  • You can then attach another bound document or leaflet on the other side.
  • Upload the video using the supplied USB cable.
  • Easy to combine with different covers for presentation folders
  • Guaranteed to wow!

products.name: Paper Cover Sets A4
products.description: Use in combination with the Spine Cover A4.

products.name: Paper Cover Sets A4 + Window
products.description: Use in combination with the Spine Cover A4. The window gives you the option to customise.

products.name: Peel & Stick Pockets
products.description:
The finishing touch is in the details! And they can add value to your end product.

These Peel & Stick Pockets are handy to attach to the inside of your HardCover or Certificate. They allow you to add extra information, such as a name card. It is just that little bit more to show that you think along with your customer.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic Clip Board with magnetic closure
products.description:
A Clip Board with a Magnetic Closure to display your documents in a stylish way. Easy to produce yourself with the Hard Cover Maker 650. Available in A4 and A5. Includes black mirror sheets.

Ideal for clamping a frequently changing menu.

products.name: C21 - PhotoBook A4 - FR
products.description: Als mensen een huis of appartement kopen, ontstaat al snel een sterke band met het pand, zelfs als ze pas over enkele maanden verhuizen. Enthousiast willen ze het goede nieuws aan iedereen vertellen, en misschien zelfs laten zien. Daarom is het een geweldig idee om ze een tastbaar fotoboek mee te geven, gevuld met foto's van hun nieuwe woning. Gepersonaliseerd met Century 21-branding: zo geef je klanten een blijvende herinnering aan hun nieuwe thuis, terwijl je tegelijkertijd je brand versterkt.

products.name: C21 - PhotoBook A4 - NL
products.description: Als mensen een huis of appartement kopen, ontstaat al snel een sterke band met het pand, zelfs als ze pas over enkele maanden verhuizen. Enthousiast willen ze het goede nieuws aan iedereen vertellen, en misschien zelfs laten zien. Daarom is het een geweldig idee om ze een tastbaar fotoboek mee te geven, gevuld met foto's van hun nieuwe woning. Gepersonaliseerd met Century 21-branding: zo geef je klanten een blijvende herinnering aan hun nieuwe thuis, terwijl je tegelijkertijd je brand versterkt.

products.name: C21 - Photo Panel
products.description: Wanneer mensen een huis of appartement kopen duurt het vaak nog enkele maanden vooraleer ze kunnen verhuizen. Toch voelen ze al een sterke band met het pand. Ze willen aan iedereen het goede nieuws vertellen, misschien zelfs tonen. Geef ze daarom een tastbaar paneel mee met de foto van hun nieuwe optrekje. Gepersonaliseerd met de naam van de koper, Century 21-branding zodat jouw service altijd in het oog springt.

products.name: C21 - Infinity Lay-Flat Photo Book
products.description: Kopers van unieke panden verschillen van andere kopers. Ze kopen vaak puur op emotie. Ze richten zich pas later op de feiten, nadat ze emotioneel verbonden zijn met het onroerend goed. Speel in op die emotie. Zeg op gepaste wijze dankjewel voor dat vertrouwen dat ze in jou stelden. Dankbaarheid blijft bij â€“ zeker als je die dankjewel tastbaar maakt met dit Infinity Lay-Flat Photo Book.

products.name: Peel & Stick Hard Cover A4 Mono
products.description:
Customise the front of your hard cover without a machine. The front of the Peel & Stick Hard Cover is self-adhesive.Simply peel off the paper and stick your print onto the self-adhesive section.

 


This product was formerly known as UniCover UniQ.

products.name: Duo Hard Cover
products.description:
The Duo Hard Cover is a user-friendly customisation tool for the front and back of your hard cover. It is a 100% dry process, with no fluids, chemicals or glue required. The Duo Hard Cover is the perfect customisation solution for all your one-offs or short-run productions.


This product was formerly known as InstahardCover Duo, UniCover Duo.

products.name: Mono Hard Cover
products.description:
The Mono Hard Cover is a user-friendly customisation tool for the front of your hard cover. It is a 100% dry process, with no fluids, chemicals or glue required. The Mono Hard Cover is the perfect customisation solution for all your one-offs or short-run productions.


This product was formerly known as InstahardCover Mono, UniCover Mono.

products.name: Panorama Hard Cover
products.description:
The Panorama Hard Cover is a user-friendly customisation tool for the spine, front and back of your hard cover. It is a 100% dry process, with no fluids, chemicals or glue required. The Panorama Hard Cover is the perfect customisation solution for all your one-offs or short-run productions.


This product was formerly known as InstahardCover Panorama, UniCover Panorama.

products.name: Peel & Stick Panel A4
products.description:
The Peel & Stick Single Panel can be customised with an A4 print directly onto the panel. Use in both portrait and landscape format.

This product was formerly known as UniPanel One, UniPanel Two.

products.name: Peel & Stick Wood Panel
products.description:
These Peel & Stick photo panels can be wall mounted or displayed on a table.

This product was formerly known as UniPanel Wood (Self-adhesive).

products.name: Resin Wood Panel
products.description:
Create your own customised displays with the Resin Wood Panel. The Resin Wood Panel helps you to customise, using the Hard Cover Maker.

This product was formerly known as UniPanel Wood (Resin).

products.name: Peel & Stick Light Panel
products.description:
Photo panel to mount photos in a matter of seconds. No machine is required as it has a self-adhesive layer.

This product was formerly known as UniPanel Light.

products.name: Peel & Stick Wood Panel Bamboo, 28mm Thickness
products.description: Photo panel to mount photos in a matter of seconds. No machine is required as it has a self-adhesive layer.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic Display
products.description: Make your own customised display with the Hard Cover Basic Display. This ready-to-use display is coated in hot-melt adhesive.

products.name: Cover Sets for Spine Covers
products.description:
With the Spine Cover you can bind documents with a paper cover, a transparent cover or in imitation leather; portrait or landcape.

Sturdy, fast and easy binding. Shrinking the spine in a binding machine gives your document a perfect shape. In combination with the V-paper you get a perfect flat result.

products.name: Ring Cassette for Spine Maker Press
products.description: The ring cassette affixes 2 or 4 ring mechanisms onto the Basic Ring Binder, using rivets. This is used in combination with the Spine Maker Press.

products.name: Spine Cassette for Spine Maker Press
products.description: The Spine Cassette is an accessory to the Spine Maker Press. You can use it to make your own customised hard covers. Place the Spine Cassette in your Spine Maker Press to shape a U profile in customised Basic Hard Covers. The Spine Cassette comes in two spine sizes: 80 and 120.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic Certificate Holder
products.description:
Display documents with the Basic Certificate Holder that you produce on your own with the Hard Cover Maker 650. There are two sizes available:

  • A5 Portrait - perfect to display menu's or other documents.
  • 21,7 x 13cm - perfect to create a bill-holder.

Includes black mirror sheets.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic For Clamp Binding
products.description:
Create an elegant and professional looking (book) cover on your own. With the Hard Cover Maker 650, wrap the pre-processed board of the Hard Cover Basic with your own cover material. What's unique about the Hard Cover Basic? The practical clamp binding: bundle your prints or documents, slide into the clamp and then slide it back in the spine.

Combine with our patented V Paper for a hardcover that lays beautifully flat. Includes black mirror sheets. Ideal for clamping a frequently changing menu.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic
products.description:
The Hard Cover Basic is a premade cover in a paper coating with a thin layer of hot melt on its outside and interior borders.

This product was formerly known as CaseCover, CasePlano.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic RingBinder 15mm
products.description: Create a personalised A4 RingBinder (spine size of 15 mm) with the Hard Cover Basic. Easy to produce yourself with the Hard Cover Maker 650. Includes black mirror sheets.

products.name: Infinity Lay Flat Book Block
products.description: The Infinity Lay-Flat Photobook is a new and unique product in the world of photography. With this userfriendly technology you create a fantastic user experience in no time! Photos can be printed continuously over 2 pages, with no crack or visible crease in the seperation line.

products.name: Infinity Lay Flat Hard Cover
products.description: The Infinity Lay-Flat Photobook is a new and unique product in the world of photography. With this user friendly technology you create a fantastic user experience in no time! Photos can be printed continuously over 2 pages, with no crack or visible crease in the seperation line.

products.name: Thermal Hard Cover A4 Eco
products.description:
The ECO cover, as its name suggests, is made from sustainable materials. Choose this cover material if you want to showcase your commitment to sustainability. Made from recycled paper, it has a clean and stylish appearance. Customize it as you wish and make a statement. With the Thermal binding system, you can crimp the spine for a perfect fit.

The Thermal Hard Cover A4 Eco is currently only available in spine 100.

products.name: NoteBook Kashmir Touch, spine 80
products.description: This Thermal Hard Cover is ideal for notebooks and meeting books.

products.name: Acrylic Panel

These front and back covers are specifically developed for use with the punch binding system.

products.name: Wires for Punch Binding
products.description: This high quality looped metal wire gives your books and calendars a very professional appearance.

products.name: Perfect Meeting Concept A4
products.description:
A personalised notebook with contents + classy box

Meetings have never been so much fun! This new concept combines a notebook with pre-made contents together with a unique box. The pages of the notebook lay perfectly flat and are pleasant to write on. Everything for a â€˜Perfect Meetingâ€™.

products.name: Print-In Ink
products.description:
Ink to use in the Print-In Printer.

Technical info

  • 140 ml
  • available in four colours: Cyan, Yellow, Magenta, Black
  • Ink consumption in full color between 0.5 and 1 ml of ink per full printed sheet of A4

products.name: Print-In Paper
products.description: Use Print-In paper in combination with the Print-In Press to transfer onto Print-In Plates. Print your design in mirror image onto the Print-In Paper. By means of the Print-In Press, your design penetrates the Print-In Plate under high pressure and temperature.

products.name: Print-In Plates
products.description: The Print-In technique is a unique process to print nameplates or photos on metal. These plates can be used for identification, personalisation and signage. They are weather- and UV-resistant. Ideal for outdoor use. Our Print-In plates are very easy to customize with our free editor.

products.description: Trendy magnet in sustainable bamboo to stick 10×10 cm or 10x15 cm photos on in a matter of seconds.

products.name: Framed Magnet kit, Black, includes front, back and acrylic (25 pack)
products.description:
Fancy giving your fridge a makeover? Would you like to hang your favourite snapshots on a magnetic background? It's really easy to pop your photos into the 10 x 10 cm or 10 x 15 cm Framed Magnets.


This product was formerly known as UniMagnet.

products.name: Peel & Stick Frame 10 x 15 cm
products.description: This Peel & Stick Frame is a unique and simple way to personalise documents or products. No glue or tape is needed. A photo or other content on the cover of your photobook, report, notebook, ring binder, box...? A name tag on a door? No problem! The Peel & Stick Frame is an instant solution.

products.name: Presentation Kit Soft Cover
products.description:
The Presentation Kit will make it easy for you to bind your presentation without the requirement of a machine. And what's more, by using our V-Paper there will be no pages jumping up anymore. So from now on, your presentation will lay flat beautifully. It doens't get any easier than this!

The Presentation Kit comes with a Peel & Stick Frame for personalisation.

V-Paper included (120gr)

products.name: Photo Book for Punch Binding
products.description: Collect your memories inside a beautiful photo book. Give your photo books a professional finish and high-quality look.

products.name: Hard Cover for Punch Binding
products.description: Enhance your Punch bound booklets with this durable hardcover system. Elevate these bound documents from professional to premium.

products.name: Rings 25 mm for RingBinder
products.description: The Rings for RingBinder are a must-have customisation accessory. These can be mounted onto your customised Ring Binder.

products.name: Framed Magnet
products.description:
Give your fridge or magnetic background a makeover with your favourite snapshots. The Framed Magnet is the perfect solution! Create your own photo magnet or magnet with your business details in seconds. This magnet has a black frame and rounded corners.


This product was formerly known as UniMagnet.

products.name: Peel & Stick Calendar Desktop
products.description:
Print your pictures and stick them to the self-adhesive strips.

This product was formerly known as UniCalendar Deskto.

products.name: Peel & Stick Calendar Home
products.description: Use your own photo prints to create a personalised wall mounted calendar at home.

products.name: Peel & Stick Calendar Pro - Wall Model
products.description: Use your own photo prints to create a personalised wall mounted calendar in the shop.

products.name: Flat Bed Foil Prints Foils
products.description:
These foils are used with our Flat Bed Foil Printer which allows you to personalise your hardcovers, wedding invitations, business cards and much more. Make your work stand out.

This product was formerly known as UniFoil Ribbon.

products.name: V-Paper A3
products.description:
Perfect with our Thermal A3 HardCovers! The combination of three techniques, creasing, folding and pressing, twists the paper near the edge, ensuring that bound documents of any size lay completely flat. The high-quality V-Paper allows you to print on both sides of the sheet without compromising on quality, reducing your paper consumption by as much as 30 percent.


This product was formerly known as Vpaper.

products.name: V-Paper A4
products.description:
Perfect with our Thermal Covers! The combination of three techniques, creasing, folding and pressing, twists the paper near the edge, ensuring that bound documents of any size lay completely flat. The high-quality V-Paper allows you to print on both sides of the sheet without compromising on quality, reducing your paper consumption by as much as 30 percent.


This product was formerly known as Vpaper.

products.name: V-Paper A4 SRA4
products.description:
The combination of three techniques, creasing, folding and pressing, twists the paper near the edge, ensuring that bound documents of any size lay completely flat. The high-quality V-Paper allows you to print on both sides of the sheet without compromising on quality, reducing your paper consumption by as much as 30 percent.

SRA4 is used to print full bleed pages.


This product was formerly known as Vpaper.

Peel & Stick Photo Book for 12 photos measuring 10x15 cm. Colour: Black

The result: A lay-flat Hard Cover.

products.name: Hard Cover Maker 350
products.description:
The Hard Cover 350 is a user-friendly, cost-efficient customisation system, designed to match the growing demand for customised hard covers.The Hard Cover Maker 350 allows you to create customised covers or displays using a 100% dry, easy process.The Hard Cover 350 is the perfect customisation solution for all your one-offs or short-run productions.


This product was formerly known as CaseMaker 350.

products.name: Maintenance Box Print-in A3

Compatible with Epson SureColor SC-F100, A4

products.name: Print Cover FlexCover 2 fold - A4 Portrait spine 40
products.description:
Give your Flex Cover an incredible look. Our new product, Print Cover, allows you to print any design on the outside of your Flex Cover. Wrap it around the cover of your document, and youâ€™re ready to go!

It has a very soft touch look and feel, looks professional and is easy to use. Caring about details doesnâ€™t have to be difficult.

It has a very soft touch look and feel, looks professional and is easy to use. Caring about details doesnâ€™t have to be difficult.

products.name: Print Cover Hardcover - A4 Portrait spine 40
products.description:
Our new product, Print Cover, allows you to print any design on the outside of your document. Itâ€™s a cover that wraps around your document, fully covering the spine and including flaps that adhere to the inside. Wrap and stick it around your document and youâ€™re ready to go!

It has a very soft look and feel, looks professional and is easy to use. Caring about details doesnâ€™t have to be difficult.

products.name: Wiro Binding Machine S310
products.description:
Bind up to 140 sheets with this Wiro Binding Machine. The Wiro Binding Machine S310 adds a professional touch to your bound documents. Metal rings are available in different sizes and two colours. Turning over pages is a breeze as each document can lie fully flat, thanks to the rings. This binding system uses the international 3:1" standard with 34 punch holes and can punch hole 10 pages at once.

 

 


This product was formerly known as WireBinder.

products.name: Cover Tower
products.description:
The Cover Tower is the perfect storage system for your covers. It is also the ideal stand for your Binding Machines. Simply store all your Thermal Binding Machine covers in the Cover Tower, keeping them within easy reach.


This product was formerly known as UniTower, Workstation.

products.name: Photobox with Peel & Stick Frame
products.description: This solid photo box collects 20 standard size (10x15cm) photos. Not only nice as a gift, but also a unique way to store photos. The magnetic closure keeps everything neatly in place. The top can be personalised with a Peel & Stick Frame, without additional equipment or glue.

products.name: Wood Hanger
products.description: This 8â€ stylish poster hanger in wood is a nice alternative to classic picture frames. It is also very popular for personalised calendars. The prints are held in place using wooden cleats top and bottom. It takes only a few seconds to assemble the wood hanger.

products.name: Print-In Thermal Tape 20mm - 33m
products.description: This Print-In Thermal tape ensures perfect steadiness of the Print-In plate during the sublimation process on the heat press. By fixing the plate to the paper with this tape, unwanted shadow prints are avoided when opening the press. The Thermal Tape is designed for use under high temperatures so that a perfect result is guaranteed.

products.name: Peleman Box Basic
products.description:
The Hard Cover Basic version of our Peleman Box allows you to fully create your own design with the Hard Cover Maker 650. It is available in three sizes:
  • A4 - 90mm
  • A4 - 45mm
  • A5 - 40mm
Each Peleman Box consists of three parts:
  • Top plate
  • Bottom plate
  • Clips

products.name: Hard Cover Basic Identification Board
products.description: Produce a table stand in your look-and-feel with the Hard Cover Maker 650. Stylish finish in leather look, suede or Kashmir touch.

products.name: Hard Cover Basic Coaster Board
products.description: Create customised coasters with the Hard Cover Basic Coaster Board. With a length and width of 10cm and can be made with the Hard Cover Maker 650. Includes black mirror sheets
